quote: An approximate answer to the right question is worth a great deal more than a precise answer to the wrong question. – John Tukey
fact: In Japan, watermelons are squared. It's easier to stack them that way.
joke: Astronomers got tired watching the moon go around the earth for 24 hours. They decided to call it a day.
